channel.title: Tools on ChrisK91.me
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on ChrisK91.me

item.title: Camera Transfer - Remote capturing and file transfer for Canon camera and Window 10
item.description: I recently got a new Canon camera, and was missing a simple app to transfer files to my Windows 10 devices. So I created one!

item.title: ECG Visualizer
item.description: I’ve created a small webapp to visualize, how the angle of the main electrical axis influences the three main leads I, II and III.
